name: Baby Cot
description: Family of 3. Father is the sole breadwinner of the family and is the main one financially supporting the family. Father is also supporting his parents on top of supporting his immediate family. The family is expecting a 2nd child in the next month but are limited by their financial capacity to afford a new baby cot.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joanna Tay

passiton.name: Wooden baby cot
passiton.description: Wooden crib still in good condition. The sponge on the poles can be removed, only put up 2 mths ago.

name: Baby Cot
description: Family has 3 preschool children, with father as the sole breadwinner. Mother is currently pregnant with her 4th child and is due to give birth in a month. Financial income is limited as it is dependent on father's, while father also has to take no pay leave occasionally to help with caregiving duties when children fall sick. To prepare for upcoming birth, family needs a baby cot to ensure safe sleeping arrangements for newborn. It will greatly benefit them to save on financial expenses too. If you have any baby cot to bless, do contact me at 8940 7451! Thank you (:

passiton.name: Wooden baby cot
passiton.description: Wooden crib still in good condition. The sponge on the poles can be removed, only put up 2 mths ago.
